Uses of Interface
explicit.MDP

  • Packages that use MDP 
    Package Description
    demos  
    explicit
    Explicit-state probabilistic model checking engine, implemented in Java, and quantitative abstraction refinement techniques (see QuantAbstractRefine).
    explicit.modelviews  
    explicit.rewards  
    pta
    Probabilistic timed automata (PTA) model checking, including DBM library.

    • Uses of MDP in explicit

      Subinterfaces of MDP in explicit 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CTMDP
      Interface for classes that provide (read) access to an explicit-state CTMDP.
      Classes in explicit that implement MDP 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CTMDPSimple
      Simple explicit-state representation of a CTMDP.
      class  MDPExplicit
      Base class for explicit-state representations of an MDP.
      class  MDPSimple
      Simple explicit-state representation of an MDP.
      class  MDPSparse
      Sparse matrix (non-mutable) explicit-state representation of an MDP.
      class  STPGExplicit
      Simple explicit-state representation of a (turn-based) stochastic two-player game (STPG).

    • Uses of MDP in explicit.modelviews

      Classes in explicit.modelviews that implement MDP 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MDPAdditionalChoices
      An MDPView that takes an existing MDP and adds additional choices to certain states.
      class  MDPDroppedAllChoices
      An MDPView that takes an existing MDP and removes all outgoing choices for certain states.
      class  MDPDroppedChoicesCached
      An MDPView that takes an existing MDP and removes certain choices.
      class  MDPEquiv
      An MDPView that provides a quotient view on the original MDP, given an equivalence relation.
      class  MDPFromDTMC
      An MDPView that takes an existing DTMC and pretends it is actually an MDP, i.e., in every state there is a single choice.
      class  MDPView
      Base class for an MDP view, i.e., a virtual MDP that is obtained by mapping from some other model on-the-fly.
